entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is introduced as a character who is trembling with rage and trying to control Harry's actions.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the protagonist who is standing up against Uncle Vernon's rules.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as Harry's cousin and the one whose diet Harry is not following.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is introduced as Harry's godfather.

entities.name: quidditch world cup
entities.description: The Quidditch World Cup is mentioned as an event that Harry wants to attend.

entities.name: letter
entities.description: Harry mentions a letter he wants to finish before going to the Quidditch World Cup.

relationships.description: Harry and Uncle Vernon are in conflict as Harry is standing up against Uncle Vernon's rules.
Harry desires to attend the Quidditch World Cup.
Harry has possession of a letter he wants to finish before going to the Quidditch World Cup.
Harry is related to Sirius as his godfather.
